name: Field
desc: Golden grain waves in the wind.

dirs.south: A mill stands on a hill

name: Field
desc: Golden grain waves in the wind.

name: Road
desc:
Just outside the town, the road leads south.
There is a large field of grain to the west.

name: Windmill
desc: The mill's sails go 'swoosh' as they swing by, gradually grinding grain.

dirs.north: Down the hill to a field of grain
dirs.east: Down the hill to a harvested field
dirs.south: A road leads up the hill past the mill

name: Empty Field
desc:
This field has been harvested recently.
Stalks and chaff litter the ground.

dirs.north: That field hasn't been harvested yet
dirs.east: A road goes past the field
dirs.west: A mill stands on a hill

name: Road
desc:
You stand in the middle of a road that leads north and south.
The town is just visible far to the north.
There is a junction to the south.

name: Hill Road
desc: Your breathing gets heavier as the road heads uphill.
